00008 #include "RTPPacket.h"

00010 RTPPacket::RTPPacket() :
00011         delay(DEFAULT_DELAY) {
00012         header = new RTPHeader();
00013         data = NULL;
00014         dataSize = 0;
00015 }
00016 
00017 RTPPacket::RTPPacket(const RTPPacket& another) {
00018         delay = another.delay;
00019         header = new RTPHeader(*another.header);
00020         dataSize = another.dataSize;
00021         data = new char[another.dataSize];
00022         memcpy(data, another.data, another.dataSize);
00023 }
00024 
00025 RTPPacket::RTPPacket(char* packet, int _dataSize) {
00026         if ((unsigned) _dataSize < RTPHeader::SIZE_IN_BYTES) {
00027                 throw DeserializationException();
00028         }
00029         header = new RTPHeader(packet);
00030         dataSize = _dataSize - RTPHeader::SIZE_IN_BYTES;
00031         data = new char[dataSize];
00032         memcpy(data, packet + RTPHeader::SIZE_IN_BYTES, dataSize);
00033 }
00034 
00035 RTPPacket& RTPPacket::operator=(const RTPPacket& another) {
00036         if (this == &another) {
00037                 return *this;
00038         }
00039         delay = another.delay;
00040         *header = *another.header;
00041         dataSize = another.dataSize;
00042         delete[] data;
00043         data = new char[another.dataSize];
00044         memcpy(data, another.data, another.dataSize);
00045         return *this;
00046 }
00047 
00048 RTPPacket::RTPPacket(const RTPHeader& hdr, char* packetData, int _dataSize) {
00049         header = new RTPHeader(hdr);
00050         dataSize = _dataSize;
00051         data = new char[dataSize];
00052         memcpy(data, packetData, dataSize);
00053 }
00054 
00055 RTPPacket::~RTPPacket() {
00056         delete header;
00057         delete[] data;
00058 }
00059 
00060 ostream& RTPPacket::toStream(ostream& os) {
00061         header->toStream(os);
00062         os.write(data, dataSize);
00063         return os;
00064 }
00065 
00066 string RTPPacket::toString() {
00067         ostringstream oss;
00068         toStream(oss);
00069         return oss.str();
00070 }
